question: Wouldn't it make more sense for Muslims to believe in the Second Coming of Muhammad?
answer:
QUESTION

I understand that Muslims believe in the Second Coming.....of Jesus!!! (Quran 19:33)

Wouldn't it make more sense for Muslims to believe in the Second Coming of Muhammad?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  

It does not make more sense.

Muslims believe that Muhammad (SAW) passed away whilst Jesus (AS) was physically raised to the heavens and he will return to this world before the advent of the last day.

So what exactly is the thrust of your question?

And Allah knows best

 

Darul Iftaa
